headline: Is DoorDash (DASH) Quietly Recasting Itself From Food Courier To Local Logistics Infrastructure?
summary: In recent weeks, DoorDash has drawn heightened attention as it prepares to report its February 18 earnings, while expanding beyond restaurant delivery, piloting partnerships such as its Waymo robotaxi support program, and contending with regulatory debates and isolated fraud and driver incidents. At the same time, the company is emphasizing its role in connecting consumers to local businesses during cultural events like Lunar New Year, underlining how its evolving platform reaches beyond...
